sentences.en: a big man with long, sinewy arms
sentences.cn: 胳膊又长又壮的大个子

sentences.en: From hip to hock long and sinewy, hock to pad short and strong.
sentences.cn: 从臀部到飞节长而强壮有力, 飞节到脚垫短而结实.

sentences.en: His hard sinewy body advertised his ruthlessness of purpose.
sentences.cn: 他健硕的身体使他显得意志尤为坚强。

sentences.en: I admire her sinewy prose style.
sentences.cn: 我钦佩她那强劲有力的散文风格.

sentences.en: Joseph was an elderly , nay, an old man : very old, perhaps, though hale and sinewy.
sentences.cn: 约瑟夫是个上年纪的人, 不,简直是个老头 —— 也许很老了, 虽然还很健壮结实.

sentences.en: Mr Hibell was a short, sinewy man, not particularly swift on his feet.
sentences.cn: 希贝尔是个小个子的强壮男人, 腿脚速度不算太快.
那男子有着强壮有力的肌肉.

sentences.en: The third group was anastomosed and then wrapped up with respective slice of sinewy membrane.
sentences.cn: 三组直接吻合+自体筋膜片包裹吻合口.

sentences.en: When muscles are exercised often and properly, they keep the arms firm and sinewy.
sentences.cn: 如果能经常正确地锻炼肌肉的话，双臂就会一直结实而强健。

trans.tran_cn: （多）肌腱的，肌肉发达的，有力的
trans.tran_en: a sinewy person has a thin body and strong muscles
